animeTitle: Detective Conan Movie 19: The Hellfire Sunflowers
animeDescription: Kaitou Kid and Vincent van Gogh's artworks feature heavily in the movie, according to an interview with Gosho Aoyama. The teaser preview at the end of Dimensional Sniper included references to van Gogh's "Sunflowers" series.(Source: Wikipedia)
